name: Lazer 2.0
description:
Lazer 2.0

Seriously addictive Space invaders-themed game!

This is my first 2D project! Don't expect much, I just want to put it out there and learn from it! Lazer 2.0 is an arcade themed game inspired by Space Invaders, it tries to use the same mechanics with a bit of a modern feel to it!

Why 2.0, where's the 1.0?

You will find out in the story update.
